snippet: The Coalition for the Protection of Marriage said two judges on an appeals court panel served on a disproportionate number of cases involving gay rights.
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column; Coalition for the Protection of Marriage, group opposing same-sex marriage, files brief saying two judges on an appeals court panel served on a disproportionate number of cases involving gay rights; three-judge panel struck down bans on same-sex marriage in Idaho and Nevada; group is asking appeals court to rehear Nevada case.
lead_paragraph: The Coalition for the Protection of Marriage said two judges on an appeals court panel served on a disproportionate number of cases involving gay rights.

headline.main: Coalition Challenges Selection of Judges in Same-Sex Marriage Case

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Lambda Legal Defense and Education Fund
